div.p: title: The Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test (AUDIT) Form
code: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test [AUDIT] (Details: LOINC code 72110-0 = '72110-0', stated as 'Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test [AUDIT]')

blockquote.p: text: The Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test: Self-Report Version Because alcohol use can affect your health and can interfere with certain medications and treatments, it is important that we ask some questions about your use of alcohol. Your answers will remain confidential so please be honest. Place an X in one box that best describes your answer to each question.
text: How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
options: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained
text: How many drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day when you are drinking?
options: SAMHSA-drinks a day / 1 or 2/3 or 4/5 or 6/7 to 9/10 or more. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained
text: How often do you have six or more drinks on one occasion?
options: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained
text: How often during the last year have you found that you were not able to stop drinking once you had started?
options: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained
text: How often during the last year have you failed to do what was normally expected of you because of drinking?
options: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained
text: How often during the last year have you needed a first drink in the morning to get yourself going after a heavy drinking session?
options: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained
text: How often during the last year have you had a feeling of guilt or remorse after drinking?
options: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained
text: How often during the last year have you been unable to rememÂ­ber what happened the night before because of your drinking?
options: SAMHSA-6 drinks / Never/Less than monthly/Monthly/Weekly/Daily/Almost daily. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained
text: Have you or someone else been injured because of your drinking?
options: No|Yes, but not in the last year|Yes, during the last year. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained
text: Has a relative, friend, doctor, or other health care worker been concerned about your drinking or suggested you cut down?
options: No|Yes, but not in the last year|Yes, during the last year. Generated Summary: unknown resource contained
